messages.title: FAIR'S WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: The Green Party is the only party that's always fought for fairness and always will.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for living wages for all, working for fairness in pay.
Pushing for investment in a fairer economy to create a million more jobs.
Protect our NHS from cuts and privatisation, keeping it out of American healthcare deals.

mentions.candidate: John Spottiswoode has lived in Southampton for over 15 years.
mentions.tacticalSituation: John Spottiswoode has been a consistent campaigner on local issues

issues.economy: Will fight for a fairer economy to create jobs.
issues.environment: Helped to start up a local recycling scheme.
issues.health: Will protect the NHS from cuts and privatisation.
issues.socialWelfare: Fought for local pensioners against the unfair pension credit system.

housing.content: Wants investment in an affordable place to live for everyone.

politicalExperience.achievements: A consistent campaigner on local issues

images.caption: John and the Green Party are committed to...

leaflet.additionalNotes: John has helped to start up a local recycling scheme and has fought hard for local pensioners against the unfair pension credit system.
